articles.description: Amid the soaring death toll there have been some positive signs that Libya’s warring rival governments have put aside their differences to deal with the crisis.

articles.title: Biden focuses on his domestic agenda and efforts to end cancer amid McCarthy’s impeachment inquiry announcement - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden will convene a meeting of his Cancer Cabinet on Wednesday, a White House official told CNN, in the latest attempt from the administration to refocus the national conversation around the president’s domestic agenda.
